content_html:
The President of the Janata Samajwadi Party (JSP) Nepal, Upendra Yadav, has stated that the decision to recommend former Chief Justice Sushila Karki to lead an interim government is extremely positive. He shared this view through social media.

Stance on Constitution Amen

summary:
The President of the Janata Samajwadi Party (JSP) Nepal, Upendra Yadav, has stated that the decision to recommend former Chief Justice Sushila Karki to lead an interim government is extremely positive. He shared this view through social media.

Stance on Constitution Amen
title: Yadav Calls Karki's Recommendation a Positive Step
